title: Contemporary Studio with Terrace in Trendy Jeżyce
description: Step into urbane living in this smartly designed 32 sqm studio apartment situated in lively Jeżyce, Poznań. The interior features a bright, open-plan layout with a stylish kitchen nook, designated sleeping area, and a modern bathroom. Enjoy morning coffee on a private terrace, while floor-to-ceiling windows maximize daylight and city views. Fully equipped for convenience, this property integrates eco-focused solar panels and is wheelchair-accessible throughout.
neighborhood_description: Located in the heart of Jeżyce, one of Poznań’s liveliest and most sought-after neighborhoods. The area combines vibrant modern development with historic city charm. You're just steps from public transport, chic coworking cafés, local schools, art galleries, dining spots, and all essential shopping destinations.
target_buyer: Young professionals or remote workers seeking a stylish, eco-conscious city dwelling in a lively and connected district.
market_positioning: Highly competitive studio in a contemporary building, ideal for buyers desiring a blend of energetic urban lifestyle, sustainability, and modern conveniences in one of Poznań’s most dynamic neighborhoods.
